Class StorageBinService

java.lang.Object
StorageBinService
public class StorageBinService extends Object
Represents a service for managing storage bins. The business logic happens here instead of in the models.

This uses a standard Java list instead of a dedicated repository.

    • getIngredientCapacities

      public Map<Ingredient, Double> getIngredientCapacities()
      Gets the capacities of all ingredients in all trucks.
      Returns:
      The ingredients mapped to their capacities.

    • decreaseCapacityByTruck

      public boolean decreaseCapacityByTruck(Truck truck, Ingredient ingredient, double amount)
      Decreases the capacities of storage bins belonging to a truck and containing an ingredient.

      The storage bins are "overflowed", meaning that once a storage bin is empty, the next storage bin's capacity will be decreased.

      Parameters:
      truck - The truck owning the storage bins.
      ingredient - The ingredient contained by the storage bins.
      amount - The amount to decrease the capacities by.
      Returns:
      Whether the capacities of the storage bins was decreased.

    • truckHasIngredient

      public boolean truckHasIngredient(Truck truck, Ingredient... ingredients)
      Checks whether a truck has storage bins containing certain ingredients.
      Parameters:
      truck - The truck to check.
      ingredients - The ingredients to check against.
      Returns:
      Whether the truck has storage bins containing the ingredients.

    • truckHasSyrups

      public boolean truckHasSyrups(Truck truck)
      Checks whether a truck has storage bins containing syrups.
      Parameters:
      truck - The truck to check.
      Returns:
      Whether the truck has storage bins containing syrups.
